text:
Special grama sabha meetings will be held in all 201 village panchayats in the district on February 26 to finalise the list of rain-affected families to be allotted houses under the Indira Awas Yojana and the list of beneficiaries for the construction of individual household toilets. The meetings will seek to raise awareness on vaccination drive for cattle for foot-and-mouth disease to be held in the district from March 1, Collector E. Saravanavelraj said in a press release.

Farmers’ grievance

redress meeting

The monthly farmers grievances meeting would be held at the Collector’s Office here at 10 a.m. on February 27, Collector K. Nandakumar said in a press release.

LPG users’

grievance meet

A special meeting to redress grievances relating to LPG supply would be held at the Collector’s Office at 3.30 p.m. on February 25, Collector K. Nandakumar said in a release.
title: Special gram sabha
